set-variable.value:
#["You are a product designer and brand strategist. I want you to generate or mock a brand " ++ vars.brand ++ " in the " ++ vars.segment ++ ", or expand on an existing brand I provided.
Please create **10 products** that belong to this brand. For each product, include the following fields:
- Product Name - Product Type (e.g., jacket, sofa, carry-on, etc.) - Collection (group if relevant, like 'Fall Essentials' or 'Voyageur Travel') - Brief Description (2–3 sentences) - Key Features (bullet list) - Materials - Colors (hex codes or names) - Dimensions (inches or cm, as appropriate) - Weight - Warranty Information - Care Instructions - Images (provide at least 1 mock image URL or suggestion, e.g., Unsplash/Pexels keyword)
Format the output as a JSON array with 10 objects, one per product.
Important: - Ensure products feel cohesive as part of the same brand. - Mix product types where relevant (don’t make all 10 the same thing). - Keep descriptions realistic, not overly exaggerated.
" as String]

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { payload: payload, attributes: attributes }

--- divideByX(vars.numberOfProds)]

db:insert.doc:name: Insert Generated Product
db:insert.db:sql: INSERT INTO public.generated_products ( batch, brand, segment, num_of_products, generated_product, prompt, raw_response ) VALUES ( :batch_num, :brand, :segment, :nop, :product, :prompt, :response )
db:insert.db:input-parameters: #[{ batch_num: vars.batch_num.get_next_batch_number[0] as Number, brand: vars.brand, segment: vars.segment, nop: vars.numBatch as Number, product: vars.parsed, prompt: vars.prompt, response: vars.response }]

salesforce:query.doc:name: Select all Product
salesforce:query.salesforce:salesforce-query: select id, name, ProductCategory.Id, ProductCategory.Name,IsPrimaryCategory, ProductCategory.Catalog.Id, ProductCategory.Catalog.name, ProductId , Product.Id, Product.Name, Product.Description, Product.DisplayUrl, Product.External_ID__c, Product.StockKeepingUnit from ProductCategoryProduct

salesforce:query-all.doc:name: Select Products by ID
salesforce:query-all.salesforce:salesforce-query: select id, name, ProductCategory.Id, ProductCategory.Name,IsPrimaryCategory, ProductCategory.Catalog.Id, ProductCategory.Catalog.name, ProductId , Product.Id, Product.Name, Product.Description, Product.DisplayUrl, Product.External_ID__c, Product.StockKeepingUnit from ProductCategoryProduct WHERE ProductId = ':prod'

salesforce:query-all.doc:name: Select products by Catalog/Brand
salesforce:query-all.salesforce:salesforce-query: select id, name, ProductCategory.Id, ProductCategory.Name,IsPrimaryCategory, ProductCategory.Catalog.Id, ProductCategory.Catalog.name, ProductId , Product.Id, Product.Name, Product.Description, Product.DisplayUrl, Product.External_ID__c, Product.StockKeepingUnit from ProductCategoryProduct where ProductCategoryid in ( select id from ProductCategory where catalogid = ':catalogid' )

salesforce:query-all.doc:name: Get Pricing for all Products
